title: How to get into the Salty Spitoon
body:
The real way to get into the salty spitoon
http://leaguecraft.com/meme/asset/meme_760px_10113.jpg

replies.body:
- How tough am I? I play Katarina

- Yea so?

- Without a keyboard

- Right this way

Sorry, no admittance. I played Katarina and threw out my keyboard last week, and when it landed, I got a pentakill. I continued to get three more pentakills that game, so no keyboard is required to play Katarina. [/s]
I've checked your comment so many times, one day you'd have quite the few upvotes, the following day you'd have 0 upvotes, and now you got upvotes again lol
Really? I legitimately haven't checked this comment since I posted it, so now I am intrigued. What was the peak?
Mice can have up to like 10 buttons so ¯\\\_(ツ)_/¯
mine has 20 :D
https://i.imgflip.com/yosa0.jpg
i don't get it plz explain someone

In season 2, most supports diddn't get enough gold for tier two boots.

Shurelias Reverie, tier 1 boots, and a couple gold gen items were all you got for yourself. All of your gold and inventory slots past that generally went to wards and oracles elixir.
Shurelia's was like rich tier support.
oh ok. thanks for the explanation

* Right this way

• I beat the Ice Climbers in under a minute
• Right this way

Lol

Was it with Meta Knight kappa
Arguably Roy was the best character in the series right next to Mewtwo. SSBM gen.
I really hope that's sarcasm

Roy was more fair then Link tbh. Even his own ability did a small amount of backfire damage. Totally worth exploding someone from 0% to around 50%.

Mewtwo was just hilarious with his whole "I'm gonna launch you into orbit" grab.

I Played Daikatana.
. . . To completion.

I use to play the Multiplayer all the time

Basicallt, you got to pick your character, then you road around in flying motorcycles trying to shoot each other

Good tomes

* How touch am I? I play viktor and rumble

* Yea so?

* And smartcast the viktor laser and rumble ult. 

* Right this way.
Literally all you need to do is hold the key, sweep the trail with your mouse and release the button.
Smart casting Vik laser is easy, Rumble ult... Harder

Me playing Rumble:

"Wait, I'm suppose to click it again? No I'm NOT suppose to click it again. Oh it goes backwards from the last place you clicked, not the fir- or doesn't, WHY DOES NOTHING WORK!!!!"

**_Welcome to the salty spitoon, how tough are ya?_**

How tough am I? I have to put up with bronze BS.

**_Yeah so?_**

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0EVavQTi,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-02-05T21:33:44.645+0000)
>
> **_Welcome to the salty spitoon, how tough are ya?_**
> 
> How tough am I? I have to put up with bronze BS.
> 
> **_Yeah so?_**
> 
> . . . .I've been doing it for five years. . . .
> 
> **_R-right this way sir!_**

how have u not left bronze for 5 years

Simple answer I have more losses than wins.

More complicated answer, I make mistakes in matches sometimes, sometimes I get an afk on my team, sometimes a troll, sometimes the enemy team has a much better team comp than ours, sometimes the enemy team is more skilled, sometimes I'm playing when I really shouldn't be,(such as when I'm tired,) and to top it off, I need to start playing more complicated champions instead of easy ones.

I'm in bronze for many reasons.
simple champs make it easy to climb, complicated ones will just give u more to think about and forget to do, bronzie.
Aye, but it is the simply champion that are easy to counter. While the complicated champions can counter their counters when played right.
maybe he's bad
Some people enjoy Bronze V
